preferred_height_above_ground_min.description: Minimum height of the preferred height. When below this, the flyer will strive upwards.

preferred_height_above_ground_max.description: Maximum height of the preferred height. When above this, the flyer will strive downwards.

environment_force_down_influence_scale.description: Scale of force to apply when not in the preferred height. Controls how much bobbing up and down the hovering unit does

view_radius.description: The radius of the neighborhood. The volume where the flyer will sense other flyers.

optimal_distance.description: The distance away from other flyers it will strive towards.

seperation_multiplier.description: Multiplier of the seperation force (away from other flyers).

hover_loop_start_sound.description: [string]Audio event to play on hover start

hover_loop_stop_sound.description: [string]Audio event to play on hover stop

avoidance_distance_at_min_speed.description: The min distance the hover entity check avoidance at when statnding still

avoidance_angle_at_min_speed.description: The angle the hover entity check avoidance at when statnding still

avoidance_hover_check_max_speed.description: At what hover speed do we check the avoidance at max distance
